usefulItems: 900 g loaf tin (2 lb), cooling rack, oven
title: Sonja's Bread

ingredients.content: 15 g olive oil, plus extra for greasing

preparations.content: Grease a large loaf tin (900 g) then set aside.
Place almonds in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.

Add rye flour, wholemeal flour, oil, vinegar, salt, yeast and water then knead <b>3 min/<b>. With aid of spatula, transfer the very sticky dough to prepared loaf tin and leave to rise until doubled in size (2-3 hours).
Preheat oven to 200°C. Bake for 50 minutes-1 hour (200°C). Allow to cool in tin for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack. Once cool, cut in slices and serve.
